{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07877v1", "title": "Gauge and parametrization dependence of Quantum Einstein Gravity within
  the Proper Time flow", "summary": "Proper time functional flow equations have garnered significant attention in
recent years, as they are particularly suitable in analyzing non-perturbative
contexts. By resorting to this flow, we investigate the regulator and gauge
dependence in quantum Einstein gravity within the asymptotic safety framework,
considering various regularization schemes. Our findings indicate that some
details of the regulator have minor influence on the critical properties of the
theory. In contrast, the selection between linear and exponential
parametrizations appears to have a more substantial impact on the scaling
behavior of the renormalized flow near the non-Gaussian fixed point.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th", "published": "2025-04-10T15:52:31Z"}
